summary: In his 10th HBO stand-up special, Bill Maher, the political commentator and satirist discusses midterm elections, income inequality, the Republican psyche, a Trump lawsuit, why the Pope is an atheist and why tattoos are stupid.
cast: Bill Maher|Patrick Moran Donovan|Michael Moore|Gale Nemec|Keith Olbermann|Russell Rope
keywords: stand up|stand up comedian|live|shock humor|political satire
title: Bill Maher: Live from D.C.
